title: How to make HTTP requests in Node.js without installing external libraries
summary: Learn how to make HTTP requests in Node.js without adding unnecessary dependencies to your project using the built-in https module. Follow these simple steps to easily fetch JSON data from external APIs and servers.

structuredData.headline: How to make HTTP requests in Node.js without installing external libraries
structuredData.description: Learn how to make HTTP requests in Node.js without adding unnecessary dependencies to your project using the built-in https module. Follow these simple steps to easily fetch JSON data from external APIs and servers.
